text.div:
MedicationRecord

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7belgium.org/fhir/riziv-medicationrecord/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.be.riziv-medicationrecord

Medication Record

resource.name: Logical Model Medication Record
resource.description: Medication Record - summary or detailed information about the usage of medication by a patient

resource.name: ValueSet - Medication Summary Types
resource.description: The different types of Medication Summary

resource.name: CodeSystem - Medication Summary Types
resource.description: The different types of Medication Summary

resource.name: ExampleScenario 1 - Changing brand name in the same VOS
resource.description: Prescribed branded medication is changed by another branded medication from the same VOS-cluster

resource.name: ExampleScenario 2 - Changing by another medication from a different VOS
resource.description: Prescribed medication is changed by another medication from a different VOS-cluster

resource.name: ExampleScenario 3 - Dispense medication before the prescription is available
resource.description: This example shows a dispense of a medication that is made before an existing prescription

resource.name: ExampleScenario 4 - Dispense of prescribed medication and of a product without a prescription
resource.description: This example shows a dispense of two products. One that has a prescription and other that does not (and does not need one).

resource.name: ExampleScenario 5 - Dispense of new brand medication because the old is unavailable
resource.description: This example shows a prescription that is made by brand name and the pharmacist changes the brand name for another brand name in the same VOS - Cluster because there is no stock.

resource.name: ExampleScenario 6 - Refusal to dispense the prescribed medication
resource.description: This example shows a prescription that is made by VOS and the pharmacist refuses to dispense the medication due to interaction with previous medication.

resource.name: ExampleScenario 7 - Dispense of medication that was prescribed to take if needed, but was not taken
resource.description: This example shows a prescription that is made by VOS and to take only if needed and the pharmacist dispenses it.    Then it is reported that the medication was not taken at all.

resource.name: ExampleScenario 8 - Dispense of medication that was prescribed, but not taken till the end
resource.description: This example shows a prescription that is made by VOS and the pharmacist dispenses it. But at the time of administration, the treatment is stopped due to a reaction.

resource.name: ExampleScenario 13 - Dispense of OTC medication for acute symptons
resource.description: This example shows dispense of medication OTC and how treatment resources should be handled

resource.name: [Profile] - Treatment
resource.description: The profile for Medication Treatment in a Medication Record - a set of treatment lines/items

resource.name: Based On Extension
resource.description: Extension for connecting several resources to a single Treatment Line

resource.name: [Logical Model] - Prescription
resource.description: A model for representing a product order.

resource.name: [Logical Model] - Usage
resource.description: A model for representing medication usage.

resource.name: [Profile] - Administration
resource.description: The profile for Medication Administration in a Medication Record - a record of a single administration event

resource.name: [Profile] - Treatment Line
resource.description: The profile for Medication Treatment Line - a single recorded item/line of a medication treatment

resource.name: [Logical Model] - Dispense
resource.description: A model for representing a product dispense.

resource.name: [Profile] - Medication Record
resource.description: The profile for Medication Record

resource.name: [Profile] - Scheduled Administration
resource.description: The profile for Medication Scheduled Administration in a Medication Record - a set of schedules takes for a certain drug, based on a previous prescription

resource.name: [Logical Model] - Treatment Line
resource.description: A model for representing a Treatment Line.

resource.name: [Profile] - Structure Composition for Medication Record
resource.description: The profile for how to organize the information in a medication Record

resource.name: [Logical Model] - Summary View
resource.description: A model for representing a summary view of a patient's medication.

resource.name: [Profile] - Usage
resource.description: The profile for Medication Usage in a Medication Record - a record of a single administration event

resource.name: [Logical Model] - Scheduled Administration
resource.description: A model for a record of a single planned administration event.

resource.name: [Logical Model] - Treatment
resource.description: A model for representing a Treatment.

resource.name: [Logical Model] - Medication Record
resource.description: A model for a structure collection of a patient's medication history.

resource.name: [Logical Model] - Administration
resource.description: A model for representing and reporting an administration of a product.

resource.name: [Value Set] - Medication Substitution
resource.description: Value set for substituting a medication on dispense.

resource.name: [Profile] - Prescription
resource.description: The profile for Medication Prescription in a Medication Record - a record of a order or request for a medication or a change of medication, implicit or explicit

resource.name: [Profile] - Dispense
resource.description: The profile for Medication Dispense in a Medication Record - a record of a single administration event

resource.name: [Profile] - Summary View
resource.description: The profile for Medication Summary view in a Medication Record
